extendedInfo.description: Slim and fast. GPS travel maps. Saves maps to SD card for off-grid navigation.Ideal for international traveling to avoid roaming charges.- multiple maps source- GPS location- recursive map cachingPlease email any bug reports and feature requests.keywords: mapsminus mapsplus maps offline plus outdoor

reviews.title: Relatively useless
reviews.comment: No search functionality, caching is painfully slow.  I have no idea how people find this useful.
reviews.author: Nicholas Bolibruch

reviews.title: Possibility to cache tiles for an area makes it worthwhile
reviews.comment: Although I prefer Maverick to actually interact with downloaded maps, I use MapsOn to download map tiles, because it has this marvelous \"Cache area\" feature. This feature can even be configured in the preferences to use the folders for Maverick, thus fixing a shortcoming of Maverick. The \"Magnify map x2\" is another great feature that makes street names readable again on HD displays. I would just like it if it were more quickly accessible (it\'s a bit hidden in Menu > More > Magnify map x2).
reviews.author: Christian Borgelt

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Used on several trips overseas and in country where expected no signal. Life saver. People who complain about this are just too retarded. Used on my Nexus 7, an old xperia 8 and my xperia Arc
reviews.author: Caio Lima Netto

reviews.comment: I tried to download a map of my area last night and it is only half done this morning.I have up to 30 meg download speed. There is no manual that I can find and contacting the developer was fruitless  It seems that I wasted my money\tHas good potential but WHERE are the instructions on how to use it.? Some of us are not born with the knowlege  I tried to download a map of my area last night and it is only half done this morning.I have up to 30 meg download speed. There is no manual that I can find and contacting the developer was fruitless  It seems that I wasted my money
reviews.author: Royal Ottmar

reviews.title: Well worth the money.
reviews.comment: I had used the free version of this app for several months and finally decided to pay for the plus version. It was a good decision. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Matthew A. Schnoor

reviews.title: Basic interface
reviews.comment: Good variety of maps.
reviews.author: ML Duong

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Downloaded this app and cached over a Gig of maps for thailand and cambodia.  On arrival none of the maps would load from the cache, big waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. No hesitation in donating. Can now map in areas with no coverage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: I use the app (mainly the terrain maps) in India, where it\'s very difficult to get good topo maps. An added advantage is for me to use while flying, where I can use it along with my GPS, as none of the GPSs available with a database of India have decent terrain details.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Basic features
reviews.comment: I own a HTC ChaCha and it can download the maps as advertised. Unfortunately it doesn\'t show my current location, despite the fact that other application can access that service. As I nice addition, it would be great to allow the user to draw a rectangle to specify the area which he wants to download. The application should remember the user\'s last selection. Even thought I realise how hard it would be, searching for locations (at least for major ones) would be an incredible improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic, fills a missing gap.
reviews.comment: Excellent and versatile app. Fills the gap between Google maps (on line only) and Sygic (great off line navigation but no map detail) as it simply gives a fantastic set of off line maps. Brilliant.   Strongly recommend.  SG2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Will upgrade to 5 star rating if the application shows my location and an icon pointing towards the direction I am heading. Good application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Good purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice app,
reviews.comment: but hasn\'t been updated for more than a year.  doesn\'t support 1280x720/1280x800 screen resolution.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cache your maps for using in offline mode when traveling, so useful. Would be great if you could provide some country or city packs...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Application
reviews.comment: Allows to cache maps (including google) for offline use. Very simple to use. Must have for areas with no service and to avoid roaming charges.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best offline maps with GPX overlay
reviews.comment: I use this for my bike rides with my routes overlayed. Works great for when I need to make sure im still on route, take short cuts, or add some distance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Had problems with others, thus inner is pretty straight forward
reviews.author: Ron Gurowitz

reviews.comment: Wonder if it would be possible to add navpoints? sgt2.3.3
reviews.author: A Google User
